DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate utility plasma cystatin C ( pCysC ) predictive diagnostic marker acute kidney injury ( AKI ) patient undergone cardiopulmonary bypass surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Cystatin C Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective AKI observational study patient undergone cardiopulmonary bypass surgery . pCysC plasma creatine measure entry ICU.AKI define 50 % increase plasma creatine baseline.The predictive diagnostic performance pCysC assess area receiver operator characteristic curve ( AUC ) odds ratio ( OR ) .
DOC.criteria: patient CPB admit ICU patient age > 80 < 18 year preexist renal dysfunction
